story_parts.text: The lion was very excited to go to Disney World. He had always wanted to go there and finally had the chance. He was going to go with his family and stay for a week. He was going to go on all the rides and see all the sights. He was going to have the time of his life.

next_options.0: The lion enjoyed his time at Disney World and went on all the rides
next_options.1: The lion didn't have a good time at Disney World and didn't go on any of the rides

next_options.0: The woman decides to trust the man and goes with him
next_options.1: The woman decides not to trust the man and tries to run away

quiz_parts.question: What is the primary purpose of the article?

options.0: To provide an overview of the current state of the economy
options.1: To provide an analysis of the article's findings
options.2: To provide a history of the article's findings
options.3: To provide an opinion on the article's findings
